title: Whispers of Dawn
author: Lisa
lines: The morning sings with gentle light,
Shadows retreat, replaced by sight,
A promise blooms with skies anew,
Soft winds whisper and dreams come true,
Hope takes root where fears once lay,
Guiding hearts to brighter day.

title: River of Time
author: Newton Ochieng
lines: Moments ripple, carried away,
Shadows of night, the birth of day,
Memories flow like silver streams,
Binding the present to our dreams,
Through rushing waters, calm and wide,
We drift along with time as guide.

title: Silent Strength
author: Mamake Rayoo
lines: It does not roar, it does not shout,
It stands within, dispelling doubt,
A steady flame, unseen yet sure,
Through storm and trial, it will endure,
Silent strength is calm, not loud,
A force unbroken, deeply proud.

title: Garden of Dreams
author: Dikie001
lines: In fertile soil, the visions grow,
Blossoms born of seeds we sow,
Dreams unfurl beneath the sky,
Stretching wings, they learn to fly,
Hopeful colors softly gleam,
Life itself is but a dream.

title: Wings of Love
author: Ryanne Ochieng
lines: Love gives us wings to rise above,
It heals with warmth, it binds with love,
Through broken roads it lights the way,
A gentle strength that will not sway,
In every heart its roots are sown,
A timeless gift we call our own.

title: Echoes of Friendship
author: Uncle Ben
lines: Friendship hums a gentle tune,
It warms the sun, it calms the moon,
Through laughter bright and shadows deep,
It holds our hands, our souls to keep,
An echo rings through time and space,
Friendship lives in every place.

title: Stars Above
author: Salome Owii
lines: The stars above in silence gleam,
They guard the night, they light the dream,
A thousand fires in endless skies,
Each one a hope that never dies,
Their whispers fall on hearts below,
Guiding where the lost must go.

title: Path of Courage
author: Dickens Omondi
lines: The path is steep, the road is long,
Yet courage sings its steadfast song,
Each step we take reveals our might,
A flame that burns in darkest night,
Though fears may rise, though doubts may call,
Courage will sustain us all.

title: Song of Rain
author: Mish
lines: The rain taps gently on the land,
A rhythm played by nature’s hand,
It soothes the earth, it calms the air,
A gift of life beyond compare,
Its drops are songs, both fierce and kind,
A hymn of peace for heart and mind.

title: Homeward Light
author: Matilda Awino
lines: Through winding roads our hearts still know,
The way to where the warm lights glow,
A beacon shines, both safe and bright,
It calls us home through darkest night,
No matter how the world may roam,
Our souls remember love of home.

title: Flame of Resilience
author: Duncan Owuor
lines: The winds may howl, the storms may rise,
Yet still the flame before us lies,
It flickers strong, it does not die,
A spark that lifts us to the sky,
Resilience burns in every soul,
A fire that keeps the spirit whole.

title: Songbird’s Call
author: Lisa
lines: At dawn, a songbird lifts her voice,
In melodies that make hearts rejoice,
She sings of hope, she sings of peace,
Of endless joys that never cease,
Her song becomes the morning’s prayer,
A gentle hymn upon the air.

title: Bridge of Trust
author: Newton Ochieng
lines: Between two souls a bridge is laid,
With every truth and vow we made,
It does not fall, it does not sway,
Though storms may rage and skies turn gray,
Trust will endure where doubts decay,
A bond that never fades away.

title: Lantern in the Dark
author: Mamake Rayoo
lines: When shadows rise and fears surround,
A lantern’s light is softly found,
It shows the path through endless night,
It burns with quiet, steady light,
Though dark may stretch for miles untold,
The lantern glows, its flame is bold.

title: Seasons of Change
author: Dikie001
lines: Leaves fall down as seasons turn,
Fires fade while embers burn,
Spring will bloom, the cold will go,
Life moves on in ebb and flow,
Change will teach, and time will show,
Growth is found in all we know.

title: Ocean’s Embrace
author: Gavin Sowon
lines: The ocean calls with endless song,
Its waves are deep, its arms so strong,
It pulls the soul to shores unknown,
Where silence reigns, yet peace is shown,
Its waters whisper, calm, profound,
In ocean’s arms, our hearts are found.

title: Threads of Kindness
author: Ryanne Ochieng
lines: A smile, a word, a gentle deed,
Are seeds the world will always need,
They weave together, strand by strand,
A fabric strong, a loving hand,
Threads of kindness never fade,
In every heart, their mark is made.

title: Dreamer’s Sky
author: Salome Owii
lines: The dreamer lifts their eyes above,
To skies that sing of hope and love,
They paint the clouds in colors bright,
They chase the stars through endless night,
The dreamer’s sky is vast, untamed,
A canvas where the world is named.

title: Roots of Home
author: Uncle Ben
lines: The soil remembers every tear,
Each echo of the steps we hear,
It holds the laughter, holds the pain,
The songs we sang in sun and rain,
Roots of home are strong and true,
They bind the heart to me and you.

title: Flicker of Faith
author: Matilda Awino
lines: A tiny flame, it burns so small,
Yet still it lights the darkest hall,
Faith endures when hope is thin,
A quiet strength that lives within,
Through trials vast, through endless night,
Faith’s small flame will still ignite.
